docs.snippet: There is a surprising number of small guards with outsize roles playing deep in the N.C.A.A. tournament this year....
docs.lead_paragraph: There is a surprising number of small guards with outsize roles playing deep in the N.C.A.A. tournament this year.
docs.abstract: There are several point guards competing in this year's NCAA tournament who measure 6 feet and under, but all have managed to stand out with their skill and durability.

headline.main: Don’t Sell These Point Guards Short
headline.print_headline: Don’t Sell These Point Guards Short

byline.contributor: Marc Tracy and Karen Crouse contributed reporting.

docs.snippet: He was a wry and agile rapper from Queens who would refer frequently to his home base, Linden Boulevard and 192nd Street, throughout his career....
docs.lead_paragraph: He was a wry and agile rapper from Queens who would refer frequently to his home base, Linden Boulevard and 192nd Street, throughout his career.
docs.abstract: Malik Taylor, rapper known as Phife Dawg whose work with hip-hop group A Tribe Called Quest was regarded for its sociopolitical commentary, dies at age 45.

headline.main: Malik Taylor, Phife Dawg of A Tribe Called Quest, Dies at 45
headline.print_headline: Malik Taylor, 45, Tribe Called Quest’s Phife Dawg, Dies
